query.sql: select b.name as pdb , a.name as "Paramater_Name" , decode(a.type, 1, 'Boolean' , 2, 'String' , 3, 'Integer' , 4, 'Parameter file' , 5, 'Reserved' , 6, 'Big Integer' ) as type , a.value as "Value" , a.isdefault as "Default?" , a.isses_modifiable as "Session Modifiable?" , a.ispdb_modifiable as "PDB Modifiable?" , a.issys_modifiable as "System Modifiable?" , a.description as "Description" , a.inst_id from gv$system_parameter a , gv$pdbs b where case when :INSTANCE_NUM is null and a.inst_id = sys_context('USERENV', 'INSTANCE') then 'Y' when :INSTANCE_NUM = '*' then 'Y' when regexp_like(:INSTANCE_NUM, '^\s*[0-9]+\s*$') and to_number(:INSTANCE_NUM) = a.inst_id then 'Y' end = 'Y' and (:PARAMETER_NAME is null or instr(lower(a.name), lower(:PARAMETER_NAME)) > 0) and substr(a.name, 1, 2) <> '__' and a.inst_id = b.inst_id (+) and a.con_id = b.con_id (+) and case when :PDB_NAME is null or :PDB_NAME = '*' then 'Y' when :PDB_NAME = '.' and ( (sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_NAME') = 'CDB$ROOT' and b.name is null) or sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_NAME') = b.name ) then 'Y' when upper(:PDB_NAME) = 'CDB$ROOT' and b.name is null then 'Y' when upper(:PDB_NAME) = upper(b.name) then 'Y' end = 'Y' order by a.name , b.name nulls first , a.inst_id

bind.tooltip: PDB name, or "CDB$ROOT"; NULL / * = all, "." = current container
Parameter name (or part thereof), case insensitive

query.sql: select name as "Paramater_Name" , decode(type, 1, 'Boolean' , 2, 'String' , 3, 'Integer' , 4, 'Parameter file' , 5, 'Reserved' , 6, 'Big Integer' ) as type , value as "Value" , isdefault as "Default?" , isses_modifiable as "Session Modifiable?" , issys_modifiable as "System Modifiable?" , description as "Description" , inst_id from gv$system_parameter where ((:INSTANCE_NUM is null and inst_id = sys_context('USERENV', 'INSTANCE')) or :INSTANCE_NUM = '*' or (regexp_like(:INSTANCE_NUM, '^\s*[0-9]+\s*$') and to_number(:INSTANCE_NUM) = inst_id)) and (:PARAMETER_NAME is null or instr(lower(name), lower(:PARAMETER_NAME)) > 0) and substr(name, 1, 2) <> '__' order by name , inst_id

bind.tooltip: Parameter name (or part thereof), case insensitive
